name: web-obs
description: Web-OBS es una librer√≠a de Angular 20 y un WebComponent que permite crear broadcasts de video y audio directamente ne el navegador.

scripts.build:lib: npm run tailwind:build && npm run build:workers && ng build web-obs && cp ./docs/README_Angular.md ./dist/web-obs/README.md && cd dist/web-obs && npm pack
scripts.build:lib:watch: npm run build:workers && ng build web-obs --watch
scripts.build:elements: npm run build:workers && ng run web-obs:elements && node generate-package.js && cp ./docs/README_WebComponent.md ./dist/web-obs/elements/README.md && cd dist/web-obs/elements && npm pack
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:elements
scripts.dev: clear && concurrently "npm run tailwind:watch" "npm run build:lib:watch" "npm run start:demo"
scripts.publish:demo: npm run build && npm run build:elements && node publish-visits.js && gh-pages -d dist/web-obs/elements
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run publish:web-obs && npm run publish:elements && node publish-visits.js && gh-pages -d dist/web-obs/elements
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && cd projects/web-obs && npm version patch && cd ../.. && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && cd projects/web-obs && npm version minor && cd ../.. && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && cd projects/web-obs && npm version major && cd ../.. && npm run publish
